dungeon.entity

Class Entity

  • java.lang.Object
    • dungeon.entity.Entity
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Dragon, Player

    public abstract class Entity
extends java.lang.Object

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructor and Description
      Entity(int life)
      Creates an entity and determines its health.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Entity

        public Entity(int life)
        Creates an entity and determines its health.
        Parameters:
        life - the number of hit points of the entity.

    • Method Detail

      • getInformations

        public abstract java.lang.String getInformations()
        Returns a small text displaying some informations about the entity.
        Returns:
        the informations of the entity.

      • attack

        public void attack(Entity e,
                   int damage)
        Makes the entity attack another entity.
        Parameters:
        e - the entity to attack.
        damage - the number of damage this entity inflicts to the other entity.

      • takeDamage

        public void takeDamage(int damage)
        Reduces the health of this entity from a certain amount.
        Parameters:
        damage - the number of hit points this entity loses.

      • isDead

        public boolean isDead()
        Returns whether or not this entity is dead. An entity dies when its hit points reach zero.
        Returns:
        whether or not the entity still has hit points.

      • getLife

        public int getLife()
        Returns the current amount of health of the entity.
        Returns:
        the number of hit points of the entity.
